title: A Good Day for a Walk
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Huh-? It’s Karin-san. I can’t believe we would meet here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, Honoka-chan. What a coincidence<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Do you have a magazine modeling work around here? I’d love to watch you model, Karin-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Umm, that’s not why I’m here. There is a specialty store that I’m interested in, so I was going there. But it seems to be at a slightly confusing place....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh! A specialty store, how stylish! Can I go with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yes, of course! Then, do you know this place?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm.... Huh? This store is in the opposite direction, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eeeh!? I-, I see.... Then, I wonder if we should go back the way I came....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s see.... Then let’s just get there from this other street. There are a lot of cute stores along the way too. Let’s go for a walk there~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>A walk.... yeah, that’s right! Let’s do that! The weather is also great, so let’s take it slow<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
